meanings.definition: A cosmetic product used to give the skin a sun-kissed appearance.
meanings.sent1: She applied bronzer to her cheeks for a natural glow.
meanings.sent2: Many people use bronzer to look like they have been in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The bronzer whispered to the blush, 'I can make you shine like the sun.'
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a ray of sunshine, thanks to the bronzer on her face.
meanings.sent5: The bronzer painted her skin with the warmth of a summer day.
